concept.title: Additional Kafka Properties
concept.shortdesc: You can add custom Kafka configuration properties to the Kafka Consumer.

conbody.p: additional propertiesKafka ConsumerKafka Consumer originadditional propertiesWhen you add the Kafka configuration property, enter the exact property name and the value. The Kafka Consumer does not validate the property names or values.
conbody.note:
The Kafka Consumer origin uses the following Kafka configuration properties. The origin ignores user-defined values for these properties:
auto.commit.enable
group.id
zookeeper.connect
